name: The Brutal Ballad of Fangus Klot
storyline: Fangus is a shepherd who dutifully wards off predators, until one day, invaders arrive. Fangus is then forced to rise to the occasion, assuming the role of savior of all Oddworldian nations. Meanwhile, rabies slowly begins to turn him mad, and he must make haste in thwarting the invaders' plans before his mind is completely lost.
summary: Cancelled adventure game set in the Oddworld's universe. The first game targeting an M rating in Oddworld franchise.
